title: Arsenal maintain perfect record with narrow win over Kairat
body_text:
Arsenal maintain perfect record with narrow win over Kairat
This content isn't available any more.
There was an error
First-half goals from Viktor Gyokeres, Kai Havertz and Gabriel Martinelli give Arsenal a 3-2 win over Kairat as they maintain a perfect league phase, with eight victories in eight games.
MATCH REPORT: Arsenal 3-2 Kairat
Available to UK users only.
